alerts.headline: special weather statement in effect
alerts.description:
Strong winds possible Friday.

What:
Strong winds with gusts of 70 to 90 km/h possible.

When:
Late Friday morning into Friday evening.

Additional Information:
Strong southwesterly winds will develop Friday as a low pressure system pushes over northeastern Ontario. Strongest winds are expected along Lake Huron and Georgian Bay.

Wind warnings may be needed for some areas as the event draws closer.

###

Please continue to monitor alerts and forecasts issued by Environment Canada. To report severe weather, send an email to ONstorm@ec.gc.ca or post reports on X using #ONStorm.
